Body:
if compat.py3k:
    template = "<% print('hi %>') %>"
    nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
    self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Code("print('hi %>') \n", False,
        (1, 1))]))
else:
    template = "<% print 'hi %>' %>"
    nodes = Lexer(template).parse()
    self._compare(nodes, TemplateNode({}, [Code("print 'hi %>' \n", False,
        (1, 1))]))
